```{r setup, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)
library(cowplot)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

predicted_consumption <- readRDS("../output/02_posterior_predictive_doses.rds") %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  group_by(metabolite, time_pretty, location) %>%
  filter(consumption_missing == 0) %>%
  summarise(median_mean_consumption = quantile(consumption_per_1000_per_location, probs = 0.5, na.rm = FALSE),
            low_mean_consumption = quantile(consumption_per_1000_per_location, probs = 0.25, na.rm = FALSE),
            high_mean_consumption = quantile(consumption_per_1000_per_location, probs = 0.75, na.rm = FALSE),
  )
```

```{r}
predicted_consumption %>% 
  mutate(statistic = paste0(prettyNum(round(median_mean_consumption, digits = 2), big.mark = ","), " (", prettyNum(round(low_mean_consumption , digits = 2), big.mark = ","), ", ", prettyNum(round(high_mean_consumption, digits = 2), big.mark = ","), ")", sep = "")) %>%
  select(metabolite, time_pretty, location, statistic) %>%
  spread(location, statistic) %>%
  arrange(metabolite, time_pretty) %>%
  group_by(metabolite) %>%
  mutate(group = row_number()) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(metabolite = if_else(group == 1, metabolite, "")) %>%
  rename(Metabolite = metabolite, Time = time_pretty) %>%
  select(-group) %>%
  kable(booktabs = TRUE, longtable = TRUE, caption = "Median and interquartile range of estimated doses per 1,000 by metabolite over previous 30 minutes, by time of collection and location.") %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("repeat_header"))
```
